title: Battle Of The Pass
opening: To avoid needless battle, the Altean army decided to cross the central mountain range, said to be impassable for a large army. Going through Adria Pass, one will soon reach the city of Pales. Hurry, we can't let the enemy spot us! We must charge straight through!! Marth and the others were anxious, but they carried on advancing across the narrow mountain road. But they didn't expect, in the middle of the cliff, to be ambushed by an unfathomable enemy. They were the northern Kingdom of Aurelis' elite squad, the "Wolfguard", who had headed south to aid Archanea.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Kris, if we can get through this pass we will be on Archanea's doorstep. Just hang in there a little longer.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Despite all the odds, we've surpassed Anri's Way and taken back Altea... The battles we've faced up to now... have been nothing short of difficult. And in those battles...

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: We've managed to keep everyone alive. With the strength of all our comrades, we can accomplish something worthy of Anri... I'm so proud of everyone.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: It's thanks to our friends that our country is free; I cannot help but think of the fallen. I want to become stronger for them. From now on, let's live so that no one falls again...

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: ...The feeling of pain overwhelms me. When I think of the severely wounded, and the many who have fallen... Perhaps if I had been stronger like Anri, then everyone would still be alive... From now... From now on, I will definitely...

battle.speaker: Roshea
battle.line: Wolf, Sedgar, Vyland. Is this really okay...? Can we really fight this battle?

battle.speaker: Wolf
battle.line: Roshea! What are you trying to say? Look, the Altean army is marching long the narrow mountain road. Now's our only chance to defeat them.

battle.speaker: Vyland
battle.line: Yes, Roshea. We swore that we could sacrifice our lives for Lord Hardin. Lord Hardin was the one who freed us plains people from slavery. If we don't fight Altea now, Millennium Court will fall. Do you want Lord Hardin to be defeated by them?

battle.speaker: Sedgar
battle.line: That's right! Prince Marth wants to destroy Archanea, and conquer the world. And that's why he joined forces with Macedon to crust Grust. Now he even has Gra under his rule. If we don't do something, the whole world will fall under his control.

battle.speaker: Roshea
battle.line: I still don't believe it. I cannot believe Prince Marth would have such ambitions.

battle.speaker: Wolf
battle.line: What? Are you saying that Emperor Hardin lied? Do you think that he would stoop to such a low!? Enough, Roshea!! You disappoint me, if you want to betray us then go ahead. Sedgar, Vyland, let's go. If we're too slow, they will pass us.

battle.speaker: Roshea
battle.line: Hey, wait! I won't betray you. I understand... I'll go.

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: The Wolfguard of Aurelis! Must we fight them as well...?

battle.speaker: Jagen
battle.line: Sire, please hold on. We've just received word from a messenger of King Aurelis. It seems Aurelis has no plans to war... According to the messenger, King Aurelis wishes to parley with you in the village.

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: What? What could this mean? That the Wolfguard is moving independent of Aurelis's orders?

battle.speaker: Jagen
battle.line: I don't know, but... Depending on how negotiations go, it's possible the Wolfguard may signal a retreat.

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: I see. It would benefit us all if we could avoid pointless fighting. Let's hurry to the village!

visit.speaker: King Aurelis
visit.line: Oh, Prince Marth. It is good to see you.

visit.speaker: Marth
visit.line: Huh, aren't you King Aurelis?! What are you doing here?

visit.speaker: King Aurelis
visit.line: I came here to stop my country's army. Also I must apologise to your highness. I believed Hardin's words and followed Archanea, but I now realize my wrongs. Archanea's Empress Nyna secretly sent me a letter, saying that Hardin isn't normal and is ill... My country will remain neutral, and its knights will return to Aurelis. I hope you won't attack my men anymore.

visit.speaker: Marth
visit.line: I understand, your highness. I don't want to fight with you. Please forgive me for taking so many of your knights' lives.

visit.speaker: King Aurelis
visit.line: Oh! You really are like what the rumors say. My body is frail and I have no children, and even Hardin, my younger brother, has completely changed. Prince Marth, please protect Aurelis in my place. I will hand my whole country to you. I give this jewel to you as a gift. This is a magical jewel containing the divine power of life. I spent a lot of gold to buy it from a travelling merchant. I believe it will be useful to you. Don't worry about Hardin. Since he is a knight, it is natural for him to die in battle. That is his fate. Well, Prince Marth, I will go on ahead. I hop you will all be safe...

recruit-battle.speaker: Roshea
recruit-battle.line: I am Roshea of the Aurelis knights. I don't want to fight, but I can't betray my companions. Please forgive me...

recruit-battle.speaker: Vyland
recruit-battle.line: As long as we're here, we won't let you get to Millennium Court. If you don't want to die, run back to your country!

recruit-battle.speaker: Sedgar
recruit-battle.line: You... Why are you invading other countries? Have you been blinded by ambition?

recruit-battle.speaker: Wolf
recruit-battle.line: The leader of Aurelis' knights, Wolf, is here for your head!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Kris, we've made it through. The palace is not far. I have only you to thank for this. You do nothing but help me.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, it's not like that. It was your decision, sire. I just came up with the idea.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: That's hardly the whole truth. The times when I'm lost in my thoughts, if you're there, I have confidence. I'm thankful for that; more than anything.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Sire, we've just received urgent news. Apparently a coup d'etat broke out in the palace. The knights and citizens who opposed Emperor Hardin's ways rose in rebellion.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: What in the blazes?! What has happened to them now?

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Unfortunately, the instigators were all defeated and captured... Rumor has it that the rebels are being executed by the day.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Damn it, Hardin... This is absurd. It's decided. We will head for the palace at once and end this. Kris, let's go!!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Kris, we've made it through. The palace is not far. I have only you to thank for this. You do nothing but help me.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, not at all. I just made a random suggestion.
